item.title: SLAM and Autonomous Navigation for Skid Steer Wheel Robot
item.description:
Robotics Algorithm Development Intern from Jul. 2018 - Aug. 2018

  • Implemented sensor fusion between Pandar40 (a 40-channel LiDAR) and gyroscope and achieved a 5% accuracy improvements on top of state-of-the-art SLAM framework and drew a 3D point cloud map of Tongji University Jiading Campus below 10m
  • Deployed control, decision, and communication algorithms for a self-developed skid steer wheel robot, realizing autonomous navigation and obstacle avoidance in a $ 300 m^2 $ workspace

Indoor SLAM @ Hesai


Debugging the robot


Jiading Campus Satellite Map corresponding to the map generated from Pandar40

item.title: Super Power Robot Team
item.description:
Project Manager & Mechanical Development Leader from Oct. 2016 - Jun. 2018

  • Designed two main robots to participate in national mobile robot competition, RoboMaster, achieving lightweight and stability of the chassis and 3DOF pan-tilt mechanism and multi-robot interaction
  • Optimized structural design to enhance operation stability and achieve lightweight, enable the robots flexible operation and combating under complicated circumstances
